column4: Dear Residents`_Due to recent flooding` the pipe system for the water has to undergo maintenance. Please bear with us until the issues have been fixed. Thank you for your patience.__UHD Apartments

Dear Residents`__We are proud to announce the first monthly get-together for UHD Apartments! From 11 am to 2 pm` the leasing office _will be hosting a pizza party` complete with pizza` snacks` and drinks. We` the staff of UHD Apartments` would like to _take this time to get to know our residents` as well as answer any questions you may have about your residency here.__The get-together will be held everyday from Monday to Wednesday next week` 11 am to 2 pm. UHD Apartments staff welcome _all!___UHD Apartments
